# Commands

viash currently supports the following commands:


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r desc}
commands <- 
  list.files(pattern = "\\.md") %>%
  map_df(function(file) {
    x <- readr::read_lines(file)
    
    if (!any(grepl("^Usage:", x))) return(NULL)
    
    nav <- x[grepl("nav_order", x)] %>% gsub(".*: *", "", .) %>% as.numeric()
    if (length(nav) == 0) nav <- Inf
    
    tibble(
      file,
      name = x[grep("^# ", x)] %>% gsub("^# ", "", .),
      desc = x[seq(
        grep("^# ", x)+1,
        grep("^Usage:", x)-1
      )] %>% paste(., collapse = " "),
      text = paste0("* [", name, "](", file, "): ", desc),
      nav_order = nav
    )
  }) %>% 
  arrange(nav_order, name)

knitr::asis_output(paste(commands$text, collapse = "\n"))
```
